title: Splatana Wiper RUS-T
paragraphs: The Splatana Wiper RUS-T is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Splatana Wiper from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.

The Splatana Wiper RUS-T is similar to the appearance of the Splatana Wiper, albeit with its handle and frame painted brown to resemble a rusty "finish". The handle has a packet resembling a field ration packet stamped with Barazushi's logo attached to it. The frame has white painted text whose meaning is unknown. Traces of oxidized green paint are visible on various parts of the weapon.
The Splatana Wiper RUS-T was revealed on the Splatlands Collection update trailer, for the 10.0.0 version of the game. Its set is Curling Bomb and Trizooka.
